structural_analysis.context_justification: The text starts within the Eighth Adhyāya (Aṣṭamo Adhyāya) and the First Brāhmaṇa (Prathamam Brāhmaṇam). The first parsed unit is Mantra 1, establishing the starting coordinate as 8.1.1.
structural_analysis.filename_justification: Combines grantha ID, commentary author slug, and zero-padded start ID (08-01-01) for unique, sortable naming.

proposed_strategy.name: Single Comprehensive Chunk
proposed_strategy.description: The total estimated length of the text is significantly below the safety limit, allowing the entire document (all five Brāhmaṇas of the Eighth Adhyaya) to be processed efficiently as a single unit.

execution_plan.description: The entire text, covering Adhyāya 8, Brāhmaṇas 1 through 5, including introductory and concluding verses and colophons.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Brāhmaṇa represents the primary semantic division within the Adhyāya and provides natural boundaries for structured data output.
parsing_instructions.numbering_capture_strategy: Extract the Sanskrit ordinal (e.g., 'प्रथमं', 'द्वितीयं', 'पञ्चमं') found within the Brāhmaṇa heading.

start_pattern.description: A new Brāhmaṇa begins with a heading that includes its ordinal number and the word 'ब्राह्मणम्'. Formatting varies (bold, separators).

end_pattern.description: The end of a Brāhmaṇa is consistently marked by the commentary's concluding line, specifying the Adhyāya and Brāhmaṇa number.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: Treat the initial text (Grantha title, Adhyāya heading, and topic in brackets) preceding the first identified Brāhmaṇa heading as prefatory material belonging to the first Brāhmaṇa (8.1).
